item.title: [HTB] Machine: Haircut
item.description: Haircut Enumeration nmap └─$ nmap -Pn -p- 10.10.10.24 --min-rate 10000 Starting Nmap 7.94 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-09-30 21:40 BST Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.24 (10.10.10.24) Host is up (0.11s latency). Not shown: 65507 filtered tcp ports (no-response), 26 closed tcp ports (conn-refused) PORT STATE SERVICE 22/tcp open ssh 80/tcp open http Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 14.92 seconds └─$ nmap -Pn -p22,80 -sC -sV 10.

item.title: [HTB] Machine: Backdoor
item.description: Backdoor Enumeration nmap └─$ nmap -p- -Pn 10.10.11.125 -T4 Starting Nmap 7.94 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-08-20 18:07 BST Stats: 0:10:47 elapsed; 0 hosts completed (1 up), 1 undergoing Connect Scan Connect Scan Timing: About 58.08% done; ETC: 18:25 (0:07:47 remaining) Nmap scan report for 10.10.11.125 (10.10.11.125) Host is up (0.16s latency). Not shown: 65532 closed tcp ports (conn-refused) PORT STATE SERVICE 22/tcp open ssh 80/tcp open http 1337/tcp open waste Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 1103.
